Question: In what year were players guaranteed 100% of their base salary during pregnancy?
extra tidbit: The WNBA now offers players a reimbursement for childcare up to $750 per month.

Question: What is the average amount of time a player plays professionally?
extra tidbit: Many players, like Kayla Alexander (Indiana Fever) and Seimone Augustus (Minnesota Lynx), attend Harvard University Business programs follwing their WNBA tenure.

Question: Who was the first WNBA player inducted into the Naismith Basketball Hall of Fame?
extra tidbit: Cynthia Cooper guided the Houston Comets to four consecutive WNBA championships and was also named Finals MVP every time.

Question: Maya Moore holds the record for most WNBA Championships won
extra tidbit: She shares this record with Cynthia Cooper, Sue Bird, Simone Augustus, Tina Thompson, and Sheryl Swoopes, who have all won 4 championships.
